definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) that are obligate outcrossing (xenogamy), i.e. gametes (PO:gamete) originate from different sporophytes

definition.value: an altitudinal zone at which individuals of a plant population (EFO:plant population) can occur defined by the altitudinal range in the alpine tundra above treeline

reference.value: Jaeger, J.E. [Hersg.] (2011): Exkursionsflora von Deutschland. Gefaesspflanzen: Grundband. Spectrum Akademischer Verlag

definition.value: an altitudinal zone at which individuals of a plant species can occur defined by the altitudinal range in the alpine tundra above treeline

reference.value: Jaeger, J.E. [Hersg.] (2011): Exkursionsflora von Deutschland. Gefaesspflanzen: Grundband. Spectrum Akademischer Verlag

definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) which produce amphimictic seeds (PO:seed).

definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) which are androdioecious, i.e. within one plant population (EFO: plant population) male and bisexual flowers (PO:flower) are on different plant individuals or plant individuals have either male flowers or are monoecious (TOP:monoecious plant)

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz

definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) which are andromonoecious, i.e. male and bisexual flowers (PO:flower) are on the same plant individual

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz

definition.value: dispersule (Leda:dispersule) is dispersed by wind force, flying in the air or rolling on the ground

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz

definition.value: dispersule (Leda:dispersule) has hygroscopic bristles on promoting movement with varying humidity

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz

definition.value: the leaf (PO:leaf) is not needle-like (TOP:leaf is needle-like) or scale-like (TOP:leaf is scale-like)

reference.value: Eric Garnier, Jens Kattge, Stefan Klotz, Ingolf K?hn, Ulrike Stahl

definition.value: a shoot system (PO:shoot system) where the spikelet (PO:spikelet) has been transformed into a small shoot (PO:shoot system)

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: the color (PATO:color) of the flower or flowers (PO:flower) is brown (PATO:brown)

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: a shoot system (PO:shoot system) that has a compressed above ground, vegetative lateral shoot with disproportionately developed or still absent organs, which develops into a new independently viable plant (PO:whole plant) after severance from the mother plant

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) which have their survinging buds (PO:bud) situated close to the ground surface on herbaceous shoots (PO:shoot axis) or only slightly lignified shoots, protected by parts of the plant itself and/or by snow cover

reference.value: after Rothmaler, W [Begr.], Baesseler, M., Jaeger, E. J., Werner, K.  [Hersg.] (1996): Exkursionsflora von Deutschland. Bd. 2 Gefaesspflanzen, 16.Auflage Jena (Fischer-Verlag), 639 pages, changed by Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: unopened and rudimentary flowers (PO:flower) are spontaneous self-pollinated

definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) whose outcross pollen (PO:pollen) has faster pollen tube (PO:pollen tube cell) growth and higher probability to sire offspring than self pollen

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz

definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) which are either hydrophytes (TOP:hydrophyte) or geophytes (TOP:geophyte)

reference.value: after Rothmaler, W [Begr.], Baesseler, M., Jaeger, E. J., Werner, K.  [Hersg.] (1996): Exkursionsflora von Deutschland. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: a shoot system (PO:shoot system) that has tightly packed leaf foliage (PO:vascular leaf) held close to soil surface and has a hemisperical to flat compact form (PO:shoot system) due to the close branching of the shoots and the short internods

reference.value: P?rez-Harguindeguy N., D?az S., Garnier E., Lavorel S., Poorter H., Jaureguiberry P., Bret-Harte M. S., Cornwell W. K., Craine J. M., Gurvich D. E., Urcelay C., Veneklaas E. J., Reich P. B., Poorter L., Wright I. J., Ray P., Enrico L., Pausas J. G., de Vos A. C., Buchmann N., Funes G., Qu?tier F., Hodgson J. G., Thompson K., Morgan H. D., ter Steege H., van der Heijden M. G. A., Sack L., Blonder B., Poschlod P., Vaieretti M. V., Conti G., Staver A. C., Aquino S., Cornelissen J. H. C. (2013) New handbook for standardised measurement of plant functional traits worldwide. Australian Journal of Botany 61, 167?234 (adapted)

definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) that shed leaves (PATO:deciduous (plant), PO:leaf) at a certain season

reference.value: after Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

result.alternativeLabel: light value 1

definition.value: the leaf (PO:leaf) is compound (PO:compound leaf, TOP:compound leaf) and digitate (PATO:digitate) with three or more divisions all arising at one point but not completely separated

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) which are  dioecious, i.e. male and femal flowers (PO:flower) are on different plant individuals

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz

definition.value: the mass (PATO:mass) of the dispersule (Perez:dispersule) or component thereof, i.e. seed, fruit or germinule (PO:seed, PO:fruit, Leda:germinule) assessed after drying

reference.value: Eric Garnier, Jens Kattge, Stefan Klotz, Ingolf K?hn, Ulrike Stahl

definition.value: the mass (PATO:mass) of the dispersule (Perez:dispersule) or component thereof, i.e. seed, fruit or germinule  (PO:seed, PO:fruit, Leda:germinule) assessed without drying

reference.value: Eric Garnier, Jens Kattge, Stefan Klotz, Ingolf K?hn, Ulrike Stahl

definition.value: the longest linear dimension of the dispersule  (Perez:dispersule) or component thereof (PO:seed, PO:fruit, Leda:germinule) or if clearly recognizable the length (PATO:length) from its base to its apex

reference.value: Eric Garnier, Jens Kattge, Stefan Klotz, Ingolf K?hn, Ulrike Stahl

definition.value: the mass (PATO:mass), either fresh or dried, of the dispersule (Perez:dispersule) or component thereof, i.e. seed, fruit or germinule (PO:seed, PO:fruit, Leda:germinule)

reference.value: Eric Garnier, Jens Kattge, Stefan Klotz, Ingolf K?hn, Ulrike Stahl

definition.value: the thickness (PATO:thickness) of the dispersule (Perez:dispersule) or component thereof, i.e. seed, fruit or germinule (PO:seed, PO:fruit, Leda:germinule)

reference.value: Eric Garnier, Jens Kattge, Stefan Klotz, Ingolf K?hn, Ulrike Stahl

definition.value: the longest width (PATO:width) axis of the dispersule (Perez:dispersule) or component thereof, i.e. seed, fruit or germinule (PO:seed, PO:fruit, Leda:germinule) orthogonal to its length (TOP:dispersule length trait)

reference.value: Eric Garnier, Jens Kattge, Stefan Klotz, Ingolf K?hn, Ulrike Stahl

definition.value: the leaf (PO:leaf) is simple leaves (PO:simple leaf, TOP:simple leaf), oval (PATO:ovate) or elliptic (PATO:elliptic) and the leaf width (TOP:leaf width) is 25-50% of the leaf length (TOP:leaf length)

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: the leaf (PO:leaf) is simple (PO:simple leaf, TOP:simple leaf) and lobate (PATO:lobate) with lobed divisions up to 1/4-1/3 of the leaf length (TOP:leaf lenght) and/or leaf width (TOP:leaf width)

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: the leaf (PO:leaf) is simple (PO:simple leaf, TOP:simple leaf), lanceolate, spathulate or slender hastate (triangular leaves) and the leaf width (TOP:leaf width) is 10-25% of the leaf length (TOP:leaf length).

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: an altitudinal zone at which individuals of a plant population (EFO:plant population) can occur defined by the altitudinal range within the lowlands and plains.

definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) which have their survinging buds (PO:bud) situated more than 3m above the ground surface on woody (TOP:woody plant) shoots (PO:shoot axis), which from a crown and a trunk

definition.value: a floristic zone at which individuals of a plant population (EFO:plant population) may occur which is defined by evergreen (TOP:evergreen leaf) broadleaved (TOP:broadleaved leaf) and needleleaved (TOP:needle leaf) forests, steppes and deserts

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz

definition.value: the number of stomata (PO:stomatal complex) per unit area (PATO:area) of a leaf (PO:leaf) or component thereof, i.e. leaflet or leaf lamina (PO:leaflet, PO:leaf lamina), which is abaxial (PATO:abaxial to) to the stem (PO:stem)

reference.value: http://prometheuswiki.publish.csiro.au/tiki-index.php?page=Stomatal+density

definition.value: the number of stomata (PO:stomatal complex) per unit adaxial area (PATO:area) of a leaf (PO:leaf) or component thereof, i.e. leaflet or leaf lamina (PO:leaflet, PO:leaf lamina), which is adaxial (PATO:adaxial to) to the stem (PO:stem)

reference.value: http://prometheuswiki.publish.csiro.au/tiki-index.php?page=Stomatal+density

definition.value: the number of stomata (PO:stomatal complex) per unit area (PATO:area) of a leaf (PO:leaf) or component thereof, i.e. leaflet or leaf lamina (PO:leaflet, PO:leaf lamina)

definition.value: an altitudinal zone at which individuals of a plant population (EFO:plant population) can occur defined by the altitudinal range within the knee-timber zone

reference.value: Jaeger, J.E. [Hersg.] (2011): Exkursionsflora von Deutschland. Gefaesspflanzen: Grundband. Spectrum Akademischer Verlag

definition.value: an altitudinal zone at which individuals of a plant species can occur defined by the altitudinal range within the knee-timber zone

reference.value: Jaeger, J.E. [Hersg.] (2011): Exkursionsflora von Deutschland. Gefaesspflanzen: Grundband. Spectrum Akademischer Verlag

definition.value: a floristic zone at which individuals of a plant population (EFO:plant population) may occur which is defined by summer-green dry forests and steppes

reference.value: Jaeger, E. J.& Werner K. [Hrsg.] (2002): Rothmaler, Exkursionsflora von Deutschland. Gefaesspflanzen: Kritischer Band, Berlin, Spectrum, 948 pages

definition.value: a floristic zone at which individuals of a plant species may occur which is defined by summer-green dry forests and steppes

reference.value: Jaeger, E. J.& Werner K. [Hrsg.] (2002): Rothmaler, Exkursionsflora von Deutschland. Gefaesspflanzen: Kritischer Band, Berlin, Spectrum, 948 pages

definition.value: a floristic zone at which individuals of a plant population (EFO:plant population) may occur which is a winter dry zone defined by savannahs and dry forests

reference.value: Jaeger, E. J.& Werner K. [Hrsg.] (2002): Rothmaler, Exkursionsflora von Deutschland. Gefaesspflanzen: Kritischer Band, Berlin, Spectrum, 948 pages

definition.value: a floristic zone at which individuals of a plant species may occur which is a winter dry zone defined by savannahs and dry forests

reference.value: Jaeger, E. J.& Werner K. [Hrsg.] (2002): Rothmaler, Exkursionsflora von Deutschland. Gefaesspflanzen: Kritischer Band, Berlin, Spectrum, 948 pages

definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) that have special water storing tissues (PO:portion of plant tissue)

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: a shoot system (PO:shoot system) that has large amounts of water-storing tissue causing fleshy, thickened shoots

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) that shed leaves (PATO:deciduous (plant), TOP:deciduous leaf, PO:leaf) after being green only in the warm season (vegetation period)

reference.value: after Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: a shoot system (PO:shoot system) typically carried by several stems (PO:stem)

definition.value: a floristic zone at which individuals of a plant population (EFO:plant population) may occur which is defined by summer-green deciduous (TOP:summer green leaf) forests

reference.value: Jaeger, E. J.& Werner K. [Hrsg.] (2002): Rothmaler, Exkursionsflora von Deutschland. Gefaesspflanzen: Kritischer Band, Berlin, Spectrum, 948 pages

result.alternativeLabel: annuals

definition.value: the lateral root (PO:lateral root) or adventitious root (PO:lateral root) is thickened.

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: the primary root (PO:primary root) is thickened. Additionally the hypocotyl (PO:hypocotyl) and epicotyl (PO:epicotyl) is thickened and act as a storage function es well.

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) that have secondary growth (GO:secondary growth) and have a main shoot system (PO:shoot system) elevated on a long-lived, substantial, usually single branching stem (PO:stem), i.e. show a monopodial branching mode

reference.value: P?rez-Harguindeguy N., D?az S., Garnier E., Lavorel S., Poorter H., Jaureguiberry P., Bret-Harte M. S., Cornwell W. K., Craine J. M., Gurvich D. E., Urcelay C., Veneklaas E. J., Reich P. B., Poorter L., Wright I. J., Ray P., Enrico L., Pausas J. G., de Vos A. C., Buchmann N., Funes G., Qu?tier F., Hodgson J. G., Thompson K., Morgan H. D., ter Steege H., van der Heijden M. G. A., Sack L., Blonder B., Poschlod P., Vaieretti M. V., Conti G., Staver A. C., Aquino S., Cornelissen J. H. C. (2013) New handbook for standardised measurement of plant functional traits worldwide. Australian Journal of Botany 61, 167?234 (adapted)

definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) which are trimonoecious, i.e. bisexual, female and male flowers (PO:flowers) are on the same plant individual

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz

definition.value: plants (PO:whole plant) which are trioecious, i.e. female, male, bisexual flowers (PO:flower) are on different plant individuals or plant individuals are monoecious (TOP:monoecious plant) or andomonoecious (TOP:andromonoecious plant)

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz

definition.value: the flowers (PO:flower) of individuals of a plant species are characterized by three different types, the first one is short styled (PO:style) with long and medium filaments (PO:filament), the second one is medium styled with long and short filaments and the last one is short styled with long and medium filaments

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz

definition.value: a floristic zone at which individuals of a plant population (EFO:plant population) may occur which is a humid zone and defined by evergreen (TOP:evergreen leaf) broadleaved (TOP:broadleaved leaf) forests

reference.value: Jaeger, E. J.& Werner K. [Hrsg.] (2002): Rothmaler, Exkursionsflora von Deutschland. Gefaesspflanzen: Kritischer Band, Berlin, Spectrum, 948 pages

definition.value: a floristic zone at which individuals of a plant species may occur which is a humid zone and defined by evergreen (TOP:evergreen leaf) broadleaved (TOP:broadleaved leaf) forests

reference.value: Jaeger, E. J.& Werner K. [Hrsg.] (2002): Rothmaler, Exkursionsflora von Deutschland. Gefaesspflanzen: Kritischer Band, Berlin, Spectrum, 948 pages

definition.value: the leaf (PO:leaf)is simple (PO:simple leaf, TOP:simple leaf), unifacial (having just one surface) and tuberous, usually hollow inside.

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: a shoot system (PO:shoot system) that has ring-like arranged more or less orthotropously growing shoots, which are tightly-packed because of numerous, spatially more or less regular ramification of the basally crowded, adventitiously rooted parts of the shoots

reference.value: Klotz, S., Kuehn, I. & Durka, W. [Hrsg.] (2002): BIOLFLOR - Eine Datenbank zu biologisch-oekologischen Merkmalen der Gefaesspflanzen in Deutschland. - Schriftenreihe fuer Vegetationskunde 38. Bonn: Bundesamt fuer Naturschutz.

definition.value: a shoot system (PO:shoot system) that develops elongated aerial stem(s) (PO:stem) whose nodes bear photosynthetic leaves (PO:leaf). Leaves are distributed nearly throughout the shoot system (PO:shoot system), except when shed from its more basal parts during later growth, and lacking in distally developed inflorescences (PO:inflorescence)

reference.value: P?rez-Harguindeguy N., D?az S., Garnier E., Lavorel S., Poorter H., Jaureguiberry P., Bret-Harte M. S., Cornwell W. K., Craine J. M., Gurvich D. E., Urcelay C., Veneklaas E. J., Reich P. B., Poorter L., Wright I. J., Ray P., Enrico L., Pausas J. G., de Vos A. C., Buchmann N., Funes G., Qu?tier F., Hodgson J. G., Thompson K., Morgan H. (2013) New handbook for standardised measurement of plant functional traits worldwide. Australian Journal of Botany 61, 167?234 (adapted)
